# Challenge Part 1

```{r}

response = GET("https://api.open-meteo.com/v1/forecast?latitude=53.54&longitude=9.98&forecast_days=1&hourly=temperature_2m")


resp <-content(response, as = "parsed")

time<- list()
temp<- list()

for(i in 1:24){
  time<-append(time, resp[[9]][[1]][[i]], after = i)
  temp<-append(temp, resp[[9]][[2]][[i]], after = i)
}

Data <-list(Temp=temp,Time=time)
library(dplyr)
dataFrame <- Data %>% 
  as_tibble()

print(dataFrame,n=10)


```
